titles.title: A bill to require reporting on prescription drug expenditures under group health plans and on prescription drug price changes, and for other purposes.
A bill to require reporting on prescription drug expenditures under group health plans and on prescription drug price changes, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
